name: EatonSecureConnect
0:
”Alexa, open Secure Connect”
”Alexa, ask Secure Connect to set full set”
”Alexa, ask Secure Connect to get panel status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: secure connect
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Eaton SecureConnect allows you to interact with and control your SecureConnect enabled panel.

To get started, find and select the “SecureConnect” skill in the Alexa App and click "Enable". Perform account linking using your Eaton SecureConnect app login details (email address and password) and a pairing code from the panel.

When you are ready to start using the SecureConnect skill simply say “Alexa, open SecureConnect” and choose from the options that Alexa gives you.

Alternatively, you can start each command with “Alexa, ask SecureConnect” followed by:

To full set the panel - panel configured for part set mode 
 • “Set Full Set” or “Set (Full set name)” – e.g. Set All House 

To part set the panel - panel configured for part set mode 
 •"Set part set B" or "Set (Part set name)" – e.g. Set Night set 

To set a partition - panel configured for partition mode 
 •"Set Partition 1" or "Set (Partition name)" – e.g. Set Main house 

To get the current status of the panel 
 •"Get panel status" or "panel state" 

Turn on or off user defined outputs by saying: 
 •"Turn on (output name)" or "Turn off (output name)" 

To get panel log events 
 •"Get last log events" or "Get last 10 log events" 

Before using this skill, you will need your Eaton SecureConnect username and password to link your Eaton SecureConnect account with Alexa. 
Eaton SecureConnect skill only works with SecureConnect enabled panels connected to the Eaton SecureConnect cloud. 

Please note – Unsetting of the alarm system is not possible using the SecureConnect Skill
